overview: Chameleon is about Andy, the son of a chameleon expert, who has to return home after the death of his father, Abraham. The dad left his laboratory full of chameleons to the young guy. Since Abraham constantly neglected Andy to look after his Chameleons, Andy has subconsciously adopted Chameleons features. Andy must face his past, his fears, and his sexuality. His father is the only thing that chains him to his past; that's why after his death, Andy is trapped inside this hurricane of emotions, that starts to destroy all the walls that he created to hide himself.
title: Chameleon
